column2: "I know you're busy, but would it be such a bad idea to review your equipment once in a while?"
"Once you've equipped some armor units, you can just leave them as they are. Oh? That's not right?"
"I might be the only one who doesn't review them. Can I ask you to help me?"
"Alright then, see what you can do."
"Received <yellow>Rear/Berwyn a<c>, <yellow>Arm/Berchesta a<c> and <yellow>Leg/Bersize a<c> from Afin."
